trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_001<tab>Ah, you're back. The people can't get enough of our punch, and it's all I can do to keep mugs filled. I could use your help with the serving again, if you are willing?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_002<tab>I should mention that a curious lady came by earlier. She spoke passionately about the “spirit of culinary adventure” before gifting us an array of unusual ingredients. Though I was skeptical at first, quite a few guests have enjoyed them in their beverage as an accent.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_COMMITTEE05231_000_003<tab>So if you have the urge add a little something extra when you serve up a mug, I leave it at your discretion. I would just be glad for the break!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>Start serving punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_SYSTEM_000_00<tab>You bring the pots of punch to a gentle simmer. The enticing aroma attracts someone to the stall!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q1_000_000<tab>Who could it be?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_001<tab>The owner of the Carline Canopy.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_002<tab>The proprietor of the Drowned Wench.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_003<tab>The proprietress of the Quicksand.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_004<tab>One of the Seedseers.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_005<tab>The lord commander of the Temple Knights.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_006<tab>A representative of the East Aldenard Trading Company.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_007<tab>The satrap of Radz-at-Han and a diminutive dragon.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A1_000_008<tab>A world explorer in search of the unknown.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_010<tab>I thought I smelled a lovely aroma! I've already sampled the new varieties, so may I please have a mug of Gridanian punch? It will be interesting to see how yours compares to the Canopy's house blend.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A2_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A2_000_002<tab>Gridanian punch with chanterelle mushroom.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_012<tab>That's very tasty indeed! Thank you─you've been a great help.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_013<tab>The Starlight Stalls have earned quite a stellar reputation─pardon the pun─and there are noticeably more guests from outside Gridania this year.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_014<tab>From locals to visitors and children to grown-ups, the joy is plain to see on every face. Nothing could bring us stallholders more joy.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_015<tab>Is this grated chanterelle? Interesting. These fragrant mushrooms are sought after for culinary and medicinal purposes, but I'd never imagined tasting it in a sweet drink.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_016<tab>While it might require a more mature palate, there's a depth to this punch that's quite enjoyable. I'd be happy to have it again.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MIOUNNE_000_017<tab>Well, I should return to my duties. When you have a spare moment from your own, do come and relax at the Canopy.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_020<tab>I couldn't 'elp but come to see our Lominsan mugs bein' used. An' suffice it to say I'd be much obliged fer some punch too.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A3_000_001<tab>Standard Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A3_000_002<tab>“Sweet Tooth” Lominsan chocolate punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_022<tab>Aye, the sourness o' the citrus an' the sting o' the spice make fer a right fine drop.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_023<tab>We Lominsans ain't so keen on Gridania this time o' year on account o' the freezin' cold, but a nice warm drink makes a world o' difference. This'll keep me goin' as I take in the sights 'neath the snow.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_024<tab>Bugger me, that's sweeter than a siren's kiss! Ye put chocolate in 'ere, did ye? An' a whole bleedin' sack o' sugar too, by the taste of it.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_025<tab>Still, there's folk as like somethin' a little unusual. An' ye'd be surprised 'ow many seadogs 'ave a sweet tooth, what with sugar bein' used to preserve food on voyages. Aye, I reckon ye might be onto somethin' 'ere.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_BADERON_000_026<tab>Anyroad, I'd best be on me way. Thanks fer the 'ospitality─next time yer in Limsa, stop by the Wench and I'll return the gesture.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_030<tab>Miounne invited me to Gridania for the Starlight Celebration, and I couldn't say no. Might I trouble you for a mug of Ul'dahn punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A4_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A4_000_002<tab>Ul'dahn punch with nopal pulp.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_032<tab>Oh my, what a lovely, full-bodied brew! You definitely didn't skimp on the butter.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_033<tab>It'd go great with crumpets and would definitely be a hit in Ul'dah. What do you say you come and brew it for me at the Quicksand sometime?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_034<tab>Hehe, I'm just kiddin'. Long as I've been in the business of servin' food and drink, it's a force of habit to consider the possibilities.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_035<tab>Well now, what a delicious drink! You've added nopal─cactus flesh─unless I'm mistaken?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_036<tab>Plenty of folk enjoy nopal roasted in savory dishes, but it works surprisingly well with sweet flavors too. I might have to try adding it to our menu...
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_MOMODI_000_037<tab>Thank you kindly! Whenever you're in Ul'dah, be sure to stop by at the Quicksand, you hear?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>Mulled punch for the guests? What a delightful idea.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_041<tab>Lest you wonder, my sister Kan-E is busy as is her wont, so I am attending the festivities in her stead. I shall have a Gridanian punch, if you would be so kind.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A5_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A5_000_002<tab>“Moogle Pom Surprise” Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>How fragrant and delicious! 'Tis a flavor that we can proudly call Gridanian to forestborn and visitors alike.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_044<tab>Might I ask for two more mugs of the same, for my brother and sister?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_045<tab>Wonderful, I shall have my attendants deliver these ere they grow cold. My gratitude for the drinks─and for your contribution to the celebration.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_046<tab>Did you say “moogle pom”!?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_047<tab>...So it is simply a confection made to resemble a pom? That is certainly a relief─and for my companions especially. Without further ado, then, I shall give it a taste.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_RAYAOSENNA_000_048<tab>Well now, that is perfectly delicious! Just...try not to frighten the children overmuch, do you hear?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_050<tab>What a pleasant surprise to find you here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. 'Tis a great joy to spread cheer to the children during Starlight season—though, I must confess, this little helper finds himself in need of refreshment. Might I ask for a mug of the local Gridanian punch?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A6_000_001<tab>Standard Gridanian punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A6_000_002<tab>Gridanian punch with a generous dash of birch syrup.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_052<tab>Ahh, how exquisitely the cinnamon punctuates the sweetness. 'Tis the very taste of respite.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_053<tab>The Starlight Celebration has its roots in Ishgard. To see the warmth and cheer being spread in all corners of Eorzea makes me feel both proud and grateful.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_054<tab>Well, now... While this punch tastes quintessentially Gridanian, there is no mistaking the Ishgardian accent. Might this be an acknowledgement of the Starlight Celebration's origins...?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_055<tab>Yet regardless of the intent, the generous amount of birch syrup is a wonderful touch, and during this most special of seasons, I shall allow myself the indulgence.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_AYMERIC_000_056<tab>My thanks for the fine drink and company both. By your leave, I shall return to my duties—many children yet await their Starlight gifts, and 'twould not do to keep them!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_060<tab>Oh my, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Having concluded some business discussions nearby, I thought to drop by the festivities. What a pleasant surprise to find your esteemed self manning a stand.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_061<tab>You are serving punch to guests, it would seem, and far be it from me to turn it down. I should like a mug of the Ul'dahn variety, if you'd be so kind.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A7_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A7_000_002<tab>“Namazu Whisker Delight” Ul'dahn punch.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_063<tab>Ah, what an unmistakably Ul'dahn─and nostalgic─taste! And what a fine example this stall is of “omotenashi,” which, in Hingan, refers to the deep-seated practice of wholeheartedly caring for one's guests.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_064<tab>I am also impressed with the offering of three flavors─a wise business decision that encourages repeated patronage.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_065<tab>Indeed, the entire enterprise of the Starlight Stalls is inspired. And in offering the chance for children to experience other cultures, it has attracted my interest─as an individual and a representative as the East Aldenard Trading Company both!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_066<tab>I beg your pardon, did you say “Namazu whisker”? Come now, that is surely a jest. I assume you are referring to some manner of ingredient that appears as a whisker—a strand of spice, mayhap.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_067<tab>Goodness me, that is certainly...distinctive.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_068<tab>When seeking to introduce a new specialty, I suppose uniqueness is a way to pierce a crowded market...
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_HANCOCK_000_069<tab>Well, the drink has had quite an invigorating effect. So if you will excuse me, I shall continue to peruse the stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_070<tab>What fortune to meet you here, my friend. I had heard tell of the festivities while attending to some matters abroad, and decided to make a detour and tour the stalls.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_071<tab>I must say, I also smell some familiar fragrances... If you are serving beverages to guests, then 'twould be improper not to accept. May I trouble you for a mug?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q8_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A8_000_001<tab>Standard Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A8_000_002<tab>Extra hot 'n' spicy Lominsan punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_073<tab>Ah, so you have used Hannish spices. It never fails to gladden me to see our produce being embraced in foreign lands.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_074<tab>And to see that, no matter where we hail from, we are united in the joy we find in festivals.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_075<tab>Perhaps I shall try to incorporate some aspects of Eorzean celebrations into our own. Yes, I believe it would make a fine gift to my people.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_076<tab><chuckle> I see you have spared no spice in this drink, my friend. I was able to taste it even with this vessel.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_077<tab>...I daresay Zero would enjoy it. They still serve her special curry at the meyhane on occasion. And when they do, it never fails to get lively.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_VARSHAHN_000_078<tab>But to return to the subject of the drink─do take care with the amount of spice. I expect the children here are no less inquisitive than those in Radz-at-Han, and may unknowingly bite off more than they can chew!

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_080<tab>I happened to have an urgent request nearby, so I thought I'd visit the stalls...and who should I run into again but you. Well, seeing you serving punch is a new experience at least. I'll have an Ul'dahn one please.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_Q9_000_000<tab>What will you serve?
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A9_000_001<tab>Standard Ul'dahn punch.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_A9_000_002<tab>Ul'dahn punch with sabotender garnish.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_082<tab>Not bad, not bad. It's interesting to note that while the flora of Thanalan and Yyasulani bear many similarities, their cuisines have evolved rather differently.

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_083<tab>Though my work for the guildship took me to all manner of places, I rarely had time to enjoy proper meals. As an independent contractor, I can allow myself to take in not only the sights at my destinations, but the tastes as well.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_084<tab>My thanks for the drink. I think I'll take a look around the Starlight Stalls and then go on a stroll through the forest. There is much to see and do!
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_085<tab>By the Twelve...
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_086<tab>This is sabotender, isn't it?

TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_087<tab>Not you too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... They aren't entirely inedible, I concede, but putting them in a sweet drink? There are <var 1A 02 /var>limits<var 1A 01 /var>, for gods' sake.
TEXT_FESXMX2025OMAKE_00941_ERENVILLE_000_088<tab><sigh> When you travel the world, you truly encounter all kinds of things─and people. I suppose I owe you for that at least...
